phrs.translation: 伊莱克斯, 厄尔克斯, 名字, 伊来克斯交家电
独特麝鹿, 独特香獐子鹿

sentences.sentence: She would show me flowers that look like cats claws, birds beaks, lions ears, doves feet, elks lips, and lizard tails growing right up out of the ground!
sentences.translation: 她指给我看的花朵有些长得像猫爪、像鸟嘴、像狮子耳朵、像鸽子脚、像麋鹿的嘴唇，还有些像从地里长出来的蜥蜴的尾巴！

sentences.sentence: There are a lot of elks here.
sentences.translation: 这里麋鹿的数量还是很多的。

sentences.sentence: We meet every Thursday in the rec room of the Elks Lodge.
sentences.translation: 我们每周四在麋鹿小屋的录制室里见面。
